name: Polymer Free
description:
Polymer is a strategic shape-creating game that combines the logic of Rubik’s Cube, the sliding mechanism of Chuzzle, and the creativity of Lego.


Slide columns and rows to create never-before-seen shapes!


FEATURES:
• One game mode: casual and fast-paced
• Universal support!
• iPhone 5 support!
• iCloud syncing between devices
• Procedurally generated: every game is different!
• Captivating unlock system
• Five unique pieces
• Five gorgeous pieces of music
• Tweet, Facebook share, email, text or save your best polymers
• Game Center leaderboards
